page.title: 06POPULATION
page.content: Although the{population}is small - the total in the 12 square kilometres surveyed being estimated at less than five hundred - it is very mixed. Some people have been in the area all their lives; indeed one elderly lady was past her ninetieth birthday. Because the area is very popular for{retirement}some members of the older generation are newcomers seeking peace and quiet. Other recent arrivals are much younger, following a trend of setting up house in the countryside to raise a family. In Pant-glas there are about forty people, some of retirement age, others new-comers. Typical are two{families} each which has two children who attend {school}in Selattyn. Rhyd-y-croesau's populace includes a retired clergyman.
